[lucre]
04000000 01CB2A50 000F4240

[The following is for inventory research]
[first item]
01000000 01CB6000 00000001
[last item]
01000000 01CB60D7 000000C8

[Fill memory from first to last with 1..99 1..99 1..18 with this code you can research the memory location for items, this code only works on atmosphere]
